verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> the things whereof <WG3739> ye wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> unto me <WG3427>: It is good <WG2570> for a man <WG444> not <WG3361> to touch <WG680> <WG5733> a woman <WG1135>.

Nevertheless <WG1223> <WG1161>, to avoid fornication <WG4202>, let <WG2192> every man <WG1538> have <WG2192> <WG5720> his own <WG1438> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> let <WG2192> every woman <WG1538> have <WG2192> <WG5720> her own <WG2398> husband <WG435>.

Let <WG591> the husband <WG435> render <WG591> <WG5720> unto the wife <WG1135> due <WG3784> <WG5746> benevolence <WG2133>: and <WG1161> likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> the wife <WG1135> unto the husband <WG435>.

The wife <WG1135> hath <WG1850> not <WG3756> power <WG1850> <WG5719> of her own <WG2398> body <WG4983>, but <WG235> the husband <WG435>: and <WG1161> likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> the husband <WG435> hath <WG1850> not <WG3756> power <WG1850> <WG5719> of his own <WG2398> body <WG4983>, but <WG235> the wife <WG1135>.

Defraud ye <WG650> <WG5720> not <WG3361> one the other <WG240>, except <WG1509> <WG302> it be <WG5100> with <WG1537> consent <WG4859> for <WG4314> a time <WG2540>, that <WG2443> ye may give yourselves <WG4980> <WG5725> to fasting <WG3521> and <WG2532> prayer <WG4335>; and <WG2532> come <WG4905> <WG5741> together <WG1909> <WG846> again <WG3825>, that <WG3363> Satan <WG4567> tempt <WG3985> <WG5725> you <WG5209> not <WG3363> for <WG1223> your <WG5216> incontinency <WG192>.
But <WG1161> I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> this <WG5124> by <WG2596> permission <WG4774>, and not <WG3756> of <WG2596> Mitzvah <WG2003>.

For <WG1063> I would <WG2309> <WG5719> that all <WG3956> men <WG444> were <WG1511> <WG5750> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> I myself <WG1683>. But <WG235> every man <WG1538> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> his proper <WG2398> gift <WG5486> of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316>, one <WG3739> <WG3303> after this manner <WG3779>, and <WG1161> another <WG3739> after that <WG3779>.

I say <WG3004> <WG5719> therefore <WG1161> to the unmarried <WG22> and <WG2532> widows <WG5503>, It is <WG2076> <WG5748> good <WG2570> for them <WG846> if <WG1437> they abide <WG3306> <WG5661> even <WG2504> as <WG5613> I <WG2504>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> they <WG1467> cannot <WG3756> contain <WG1467> <WG5736>, let them marry <WG1060> <WG5657>: for <WG1063> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> better <WG2909> to marry <WG1060> <WG5658> than <WG2228> to burn <WG4448> <WG5745>.

And <WG1161> unto the married <WG1060> <WG5761> I command <WG3853> <WG5719>, yet not <WG3756> I <WG1473>, but <WG235> the YY <WG2962>, Let <WG5563> not <WG3361> the wife <WG1135> depart <WG5563> <WG5683> from <WG575> her husband <WG435>:

But <WG1161> and <WG2532> if <WG1437> she depart <WG5563> <WG5681>, let her remain <WG3306> <WG5720> unmarried <WG22>, or <WG2228> be reconciled <WG2644> <WG5649> to her husband <WG435>: and <WG2532> let <WG863> not <WG3361> the husband <WG435> put away <WG863> <WG5721> his wife <WG1135>.

But <WG1161> to the rest <WG3062> speak <WG3004> <WG5719> I <WG1473>, not <WG3756> the YY <WG2962>: If any <WG1536> brother <WG80> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> a wife <WG1135> that believeth not <WG571>, and <WG2532> she <WG846> be pleased <WG4909> <WG5719> to dwell <WG3611> <WG5721> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, let him <WG863> not <WG3361> put <WG863> her <WG846> away <WG863> <WG5720>.

And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> which <WG3748> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> an husband <WG435> that believeth not <WG571>, and <WG2532> if he <WG846> be pleased <WG4909> <WG5719> to dwell <WG3611> <WG5721> with <WG3326> her <WG846>, let her <WG863> not <WG3361> leave <WG863> <WG5720> him <WG846>.

For <WG1063> the unbelieving <WG571> husband <WG435> is sanctified <WG37> <WG5769> by <WG1722> the wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> the unbelieving <WG571> wife <WG1135> is sanctified <WG37> <WG5769> by <WG1722> the husband <WG435>: else <WG686> <WG1893> were <WG2076> <WG5748> your <WG5216> children <WG5043> unclean <WG169>; but <WG1161> now <WG3568> are they <WG2076> <WG5748> holy <WG40>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> the unbelieving <WG571> depart <WG5563> <WG5731>, let him depart <WG5563> <WG5744>. A brother <WG80> or <WG2228> a sister <WG79> is <WG1402> not <WG3756> under bondage <WG1402> <WG5769> in <WG1722> such <WG5108> cases: but <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath called <WG2564> <WG5758> us <WG2248> to <WG1722> peace <WG1515>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> knowest thou <WG1492> <WG5758>, O wife <WG1135>, whether <WG1487> thou shalt save <WG4982> <WG5692> thy husband <WG435>? or <WG2228> how <WG5101> knowest thou <WG1492> <WG5758>, O man <WG435>, whether <WG1487> thou shalt save <WG4982> <WG5692> thy wife <WG1135>?

But <WG1508> as <WG5613> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath distributed <WG3307> <WG5656> to every man <WG1538>, as <WG5613> the YY <WG2962> hath called <WG2564> <WG5758> every one <WG1538>, so <WG3779> let him walk <WG4043> <WG5720>. And <WG2532> so <WG3779> ordain I <WG1299> <WG5731> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> Congregations <WG1577>.

Is <WG2564> any man <WG5100> called <WG2564> <WG5681> being circumcised <WG4059> <WG5772>? let him <WG1986> not <WG3361> become uncircumcised <WG1986> <WG5737>. Is <WG2564> any <WG5100> called <WG2564> <WG5681> in <WG1722> unb'ritmilah <WG203>? let him <WG4059> not <WG3361> be circumcised <WG4059> <WG5744>.

Circumcision <WG4061> is <WG2076> <WG5748> nothing <WG3762>, and <WG2532> unb'ritmilah <WG203> is <WG2076> <WG5748> nothing <WG3762>, but <WG235> the keeping <WG5084> of the Mitzvot <WG1785> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
Let <WG3306> every man <WG1538> abide <WG3306> <WG5720> in <WG1722> the same <WG5026> calling <WG2821> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> he was called <WG2564> <WG5681>.

Art thou called <WG2564> <WG5681> being a servant <WG1401>? care <WG3199> <WG4671> not <WG3361> for it <WG3199> <WG5720>: but <WG235> if <WG1499> thou mayest <WG1410> <WG5736> be made <WG1096> <WG5635> free <WG1658>, use <WG5530> <WG5663> it rather <WG3123>.

For <WG1063> he that is called <WG2564> <WG5685> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, being a servant <WG1401>, is <WG2076> <WG5748> the YY's <WG2962> freeman <WG558>: likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> he that is called <WG2564> <WG5685>, being free <WG1658>, is <WG2076> <WG5748> Moshiach's <WG5547> servant <WG1401>.
Ye are bought <WG59> <WG5681> with a price <WG5092>; be <WG1096> not <WG3361> ye <WG1096> <WG5737> the servants <WG1401> of men <WG444>.
Brethren <WG80>, let <WG3306> every man <WG1538>, wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> he is called <WG2564> <WG5681>, therein <WG1722> <WG5129> abide <WG3306> <WG5720> with <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> virgins <WG3933> I have <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> Mitzvah <WG2003> of the YY <WG2962>: yet <WG1161> I give <WG1325> <WG5719> my judgment <WG1106>, as <WG5613> one that hath obtained mercy <WG1653> <WG5772> of <WG5259> the YY <WG2962> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> faithful <WG4103>.

I suppose <WG3543> <WG5719> therefore <WG3767> that this <WG5124> is <WG5225> <WG5721> good <WG2570> for <WG1223> the present <WG1764> <WG5761> distress <WG318>, I say, that <WG3754> it is good <WG2570> for a man <WG444> so <WG3779> to be <WG1511> <WG5750>.

Art thou bound <WG1210> <WG5769> unto a wife <WG1135>? seek <WG2212> <WG5720> not <WG3361> to be loosed <WG3080>. Art thou loosed <WG3089> <WG5769> from <WG575> a wife <WG1135>? seek <WG2212> <WG5720> not <WG3361> a wife <WG1135>.

But <WG1161> and <WG2532> if <WG1437> thou marry <WG1060> <WG5661>, thou hast <WG264> not <WG3756> sinned <WG264> <WG5627>; and <WG2532> if <WG1437> a virgin <WG3933> marry <WG1060> <WG5661>, she hath <WG264> not <WG3756> sinned <WG264> <WG5627>. Nevertheless <WG1161> such <WG5108> shall have <WG2192> <WG5692> trouble <WG2347> in the flesh <WG4561>: but <WG1161> I <WG1473> spare <WG5339> <WG5736> you <WG5216>.

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG5346> <WG5748>, brethren <WG80>, the time <WG2540> is short <WG4958> <WG5772>: it remaineth <WG2076> <WG5748> <WG3063>, that <WG2443> both <WG2532> they that have <WG2192> <WG5723> wives <WG1135> be <WG5600> <WG5753> as though <WG5613> they had <WG2192> <WG5723> none <WG3361>;

And <WG2532> they that weep <WG2799> <WG5723>, as <WG5613> though they wept <WG2799> <WG5723> not <WG3361>; and <WG2532> they that rejoice <WG5463> <WG5723>, as <WG5613> though they rejoiced <WG5463> <WG5723> not <WG3361>; and <WG2532> they that buy <WG59> <WG5723>, as <WG5613> though they possessed <WG2722> <WG5723> not <WG3361>;

And <WG2532> they that use <WG5530> <WG5740> this <WG5127> world <WG2889>, as <WG5613> not <WG3361> abusing <WG2710> <WG5740> it: for <WG1063> the fashion <WG4976> of this <WG5129> world <WG2889> passeht away <WG3855> <WG5719>.

But <WG1161> I would have <WG1511> <WG5750> <WG2309> <WG5719> you <WG5209> without carefulness <WG275>. He that is unmarried <WG22> careth <WG3309> <WG5719> for the things that belong to <WG3588> the YY <WG2962>, how <WG4459> he may please <WG700> <WG5692> the YY <WG2962>:
But <WG1161> he that is married <WG1060> <WG5660> careth <WG3309> <WG5719> for the things that are <WG3588> of the world <WG2889>, how <WG4459> he may please <WG700> <WG5692> his wife <WG1135>.

There is difference also between <WG3307> <WG5769> a wife <WG1135> and <WG2532> a virgin <WG3933>. The unmarried woman <WG22> careth for <WG3309> <WG5719> the things <WG3588> of the YY <WG2962>, that <WG2443> she may be <WG5600> <WG5753> holy <WG40> both <WG2532> in body <WG4983> and <WG2532> in spirit <WG4151>: but <WG1161> she that is married <WG1060> <WG5660> careth <WG3309> <WG5719> for the things <WG3588> of the world <WG2889>, how <WG4459> she may please <WG700> <WG5692> her husband <WG435>.

And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> for <WG4314> your <WG5216> own <WG846> profit <WG4851> <WG5723>; not <WG3756> that <WG2443> I may cast <WG1911> <WG5632> a snare <WG1029> upon you <WG5213>, but <WG235> for that which <WG4314> is comely <WG2158>, and <WG2532> that ye may attend upon <WG2145> the YY <WG2962> without distraction <WG563>.

But <WG1161> if any man <WG1536> think <WG3543> <WG5719> that he behaveth himself uncomely <WG807> <WG5721> toward <WG1909> his <WG846> virgin <WG3933>, if <WG1437> she pass the flower of her age <WG5230> <WG5600> <WG5753>, and <WG2532> need <WG3784> <WG5719> so <WG3779> require <WG1096> <WG5738>, let him do <WG4160> <WG5720> what <WG3739> he will <WG2309> <WG5719>, he sinneth <WG264> <WG5719> not <WG3756>: let them marry <WG1060> <WG5720>.

Nevertheless <WG1161> he <WG3739> that standeth <WG2476> <WG5707> <WG5758> stedfast <WG1476> in <WG1722> his heart <WG2588>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> no <WG3361> necessity <WG318>, but <WG1161> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> power <WG1849> over <WG4012> his own <WG2398> will <WG2307>, and <WG2532> hath <WG2919> so <WG5124> decreed <WG2919> <WG5758> in <WG1722> his <WG846> heart <WG2588> that he will keep <WG5083> <WG5721> his <WG1438> virgin <WG3933>, doeth <WG4160> <WG5719> well <WG2573>.

So <WG5620> then <WG2532> he that giveth her in marriage <WG1547> <WG5723> doeth <WG4160> <WG5719> well <WG2573>; but <WG1161> he that giveth her <WG1547> not <WG3361> in marriage <WG1547> <WG5723> doeth <WG4160> <WG5719> better <WG2908>.

The wife <WG1135> is bound <WG1210> <WG5769> by the Torah <WG3551> <WG1909> as long <WG5550> as <WG3745> her <WG846> husband <WG435> liveth <WG2198> <WG5719>; but <WG1161> if <WG1437> her <WG846> husband <WG435> be dead <WG2837> <WG5686>, she is <WG2076> <WG5748> at liberty <WG1658> to be married <WG1060> <WG5683> to whom <WG3739> she will <WG2309> <WG5719>; only <WG3440> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.

But <WG1161> she is <WG2076> <WG5748> happier <WG3107> if <WG1437> she <WG3306> so <WG3779> abide <WG3306> <WG5661>, after <WG2596> my <WG1699> judgment <WG1106>: and <WG1161> I think <WG1380> <WG5719> also <WG2504> that I have <WG2192> <WG5721> the Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
